Title: The Fourth Horseman (1)
Plot: Earth is infected with a deadly Ori plague, prompting an ally from SG-1's past to come to their aide. Gerak proposes that the Free Jaffa follow the Ori religion.
GuestStars: Tony Amendola, Gary Jones, Bill Dow, Thomas Milburn Jr., Lexa Doig, Louis Gossett,  Jr., Cameron Bright, Don S. Davis, Julian Sands
